sub_title: Director Netherlands Office at Azerbaijan Netherlands Business Hub
summary:
Meet me where international business is!
“Elwin Hulscher studied Facility Management and graduated in 2004. His interest in International 
Business grew when he worked for Floriade Expo 2012. In the past 10 years he has built up an extensive international network. He likes to connect people and close gaps between differences in cultures. 

Currently he is Director at the Netherlands Office of the Azerbaijan Netherlands Business Hub. To enhance the economic cooperation between the Republic of Azerbaijan and the Kingdom of the Netherlands he is organizing activities, such as tailor made trade missions and business travel incentives, and developing projects in different sectors. 
He is also active as International Business Advisor and always open to discuss new challenges.”

projects.title: Business Forum Netherlands-Azerbaijan (Maastricht)
projects.description:
In collaboration with the Dutch province of Limburg, Netherlands Council for Trade Promotion (NCH), the Maastricht School of Management (MSM) and Flanders Investment and Trade (FIT).

Keynote Speakers: 
Shahin Mustafayev, Azerbaijani Minister of Economy and Industry
Henk Kamp, Dutch Minister of Economic Affairs
Shahmar Movsumov, CEO, Azerbaijani State Oil Fund (SOFAZ)

projects.title: Business Forum Brussels
projects.description:
Co-Organizer of the 2nd Annual Azerbaijani Business Forum Brussels, taking place on 14 October 2015 at the prestigious Diamant Conference & Business Centre. 

The European Azerbaijan Society (TEAS) as main organizer in cooperation with her international partners is pleased to present the following sessions: Doing business in Azerbaijan; 
Energy (hydrocarbons and renewable, including maritime); Agribusiness (agri- and viticulture); Infrastructure (construction, aviation, roads, railways); and ICT (e-Tax, e-Government).

Azerbaijani companies will be attending, together with their counterparts from Belgium, Czech Republic, France, Germany, Hungary, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Slovakia, Spain and the UK.

profile_positions.title: Director Netherlands Office

profile_positions.description:
After Floriade Expo 2012 closed its doors at the end of 2012 I continued with my activities in the field of International Business. It started with the follow up of maintaining and expanding the international network which was built up during Floriade Expo 2012 for the Greenport Venlo region. At the same time I started with supporting and advising several clients to improve their international profile and strengthen their business. 

In the past 15 years I have expanded my international network. During my projects I visited various countries such as Azerbaijan, Bulgaria, Croatia, Germany, Kazakhstan, Romania and South Korea. In addition I hosted over 50 international groups from all over the world. 
What do I like the most in my job? To learn from all the different cultures, to connect people and to develop successful projects.
profile_positions.title: International Business Advisor/Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Floriade Expo 2022 is an exposition and event organized by the Dutch agricultural and horticultural sector. The central theme of the 2022 edition is the Green City of the Future.
More than 50% of the earth’s 7 billion inhabitants already live in cities. This is expected to increase to 70% by 2050. How will we keep our cities livable, healthy and attractive? Floriade will address these and other issues facing the city on a global basis and exhibit numerous, innovative solutions. Solutions offered by Dutch businesses - and by countries and cities, worldwide. They will be presented in the context of a total exposition formula including an event, a green city district, art and numerous attractions. The themes are: green, food, health and energy.
www.floriade.com
profile_positions.title: Director International Participants

profile_positions.description:
Greenport Venlo is one of the six Greenports in The Netherlands and is located in the heart of Western Europe (close to Germany and important gateway to Europe). It is the second largest concentration of horticulture in the Netherlands and even the most miscellaneous in Europe.
Due to the strategic location, Greenport Venlo is a very important logistical hotspot. In the region there is an unique cooperative venture in the field of agribusiness between the public and private sectors, science, education and the local residents. The aim is to provide an impulse for the economy of the region of North Limburg with a strong accent on business development and innovation.
profile_positions.title: Advisor International Business Development

profile_positions.description:
Activities:
- Developing the strategy for the acquisition of the international participants

- Acquisition of the international participants, among others we visited 20 countries worldwide and more than 50 Embassies in Brussels and The Hague 
Result: there are 50 international participants from more than 40 different countries participating; Target was: 25 international participants

- Communication with the participants and the related (diplomatic) network in The Netherlands and abroad

- Supporting and advising the international participants to make their participation successful

- Involvement in cultural (national days) and business program (B2B, matchmaking)

- Communication and cooperation with various stakeholders to increase business for Floriade 2012 and by this stimulating the economical spinoff and internationalization of the Venlo region

- Promote, initiate, facilitate and follow up to international trade missions
profile_positions.title: Account Manager International Participants

profile_positions.description:
Floriade 2012 is a World Horticultural Expo and organized once every ten year in The Netherlands.

Activities:
- Promote, initiate and develop activities for branding and concepting

- Communication with schools and other stakeholders

- Coordinate and support promotional activities

- Representing Floriade 2012 at fairs

- Writing business plan Floriade Kids

- Generate new target groups
profile_positions.title: Experience Marketing Employee

profile_positions.description:
Van Assendelft & Partners has been a specialized Leisure & Culture Consultancy since 1997. During this time it has fulfilled over a hundred and eighty assignments and projects for many nationally and internationally renowned clients.

As project manager I did a lot of supported activities for the director. I did for example a lot of market research for the assignments and projects. I made also a plan for an international congress in 2011. We were also responsible for the city-marketing project "Enjoy the luxury of Nijmegen" and we organized the network walking-tour "Mosae Magus Trajectum" with eighty entrepreneurs from Xanten to Nijmegen.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
DutchSpirit started with the view to bring sustainability to the consumer. We were the first fashion brand who produced climate neutral. We did a lot of different projects with several partners.

As owner of the company, my tasks were very different with writing business plans, organizing fashion shows, leading projects, administration, sales, buying, P&O, logistics, etc. Main part of my tasks was to manage the marketing activities. 

Some highlights of the company were fashion shows during Live Earth Alert (07-07-2007) at the main stage in Amsterdam, fashion shows at Parkpop and the nomination for the DAR MVO Award 2007(sustainability).
profile_positions.title: Owner / Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description: As project leader I organised some exhibitions of famous artists like Rob Scholte and Henk Schiffmacher.
profile_positions.title: Project leader
